typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AssignmentTypeDesc as string,
		CareerStageNumber as integer,
		FromDate as timestamp,
		PersonnelNumber as integer,
		ToDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01PersonCareerStage
source(output(
		ActiveInd as string,
		CareerStageDesc as string,
		CareerStageName as string,
		CareerStageNumber as integer,
		FromDate as timestamp,
		ToDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01CareerStage
HC01PersonCareerStage select(mapColumn(
		CareerStageNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HC01PersonCareerStageProjection
HC01CareerStage select(mapColumn(
		CareerStageName,
		CareerStageNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HC01CareerStageProjection
HC01PersonCareerStageProjection, HC01CareerStageProjection join(HC01PersonCareerStageProjection@CareerStageNumber == HC01CareerStageProjection@CareerStageNumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinedStream
JoinedStream aggregate(groupBy(CareerStageName),
	Count = countDistinct(HC01PersonCareerStageProjection@CareerStageNumber)) ~> Metrics
Metrics sink(mapColumn(
		CareerStageName,
		Count
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	format: 'table') ~> Output
